data.title: Bitcoin’s BOJ Stumble Shows Dovish Fed Isn’t Enough for Crypto
data.description: Bitcoin’s sudden drop on Monday was a fresh reminder of how cryptocurrency prices are influenced by an ever-widening array of macroeconomic factors, making it trickier for traders to gauge the market’s direction after the recent selloff.
data.keywords: Bitcoin,Cryptocurrency,BANK OF JAPAN/THE,Bear Market,Kazuo Ueda,Tokyo,Government,Bonds,Federal Reserve,Interest Rates,crypto,markets
